roleset.name: bring into existence
roleset.note: BEGET-V NOTES: Actually, I believe the past tense of 'beget' is 'begat.' OED doesn'tagree with me, though, calling 'begat' archaic. Pfah, what do they know? (from beget.01-v)

example.name: I love strong verbs
example.text: The concept begot a slew of copycats, but the banks stopped promoting the packages.
